data.description: perl bindings for the Xapian search library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Xapian is a powerful and adaptable open source information
    retrieval library, written in C++.

    As far as I am aware, no other modules exist that provide advanced
    indexing / searching features; either as perl bindings to libraries
    in other languages, or written in pure perl.

    A few of Xapian's features: - Licensed under the GPL - Highly
    portable - Ranked probablistic search - Relevance feedback - Phrase
    and proximity searching - Full range of structured boolean search
    operators - Supports stemming of search terms - Supports database
    files > 2GB - Platform independent data formats - Allows
    simultaneous update and searching
